column4: quick question, how do i change the resolution on ubuntu? it is currently set on 1024 768 and i need 1680x1050, but when i got into prefrences > screen resolution, it only allows me up to 1024  768... any ideas?
did you have the machine on then plug the monitor in before log in/ while it was booting up?
i had the monitor pluged in b4 login screen, yes
